mapper.select: SELECT L.BOOK_NO ,L.BOOK_CATE_NO ,L.TITLE ,L.AUTHOR ,L.COMPANY ,L.CONT ,TO_CHAR(L.PUBLISHER_YEAR , 'YYYY"년도"') AS PUBLISHER_YEAR ,S.BOOK_STATE FROM BOOK_LIST L JOIN BOOK_STATUS S ON L.STATUS_NO = S.STATUS_NO
SELECT BOOK_NO ,BOOK_CATE_NO ,TITLE ,AUTHOR ,COMPANY ,CONT ,PUBLISHER_YEAR ,BOOK_IMG FROM BOOK_LIST WHERE TITLE = #{title} OR AUTHOR = #{author} OR COMPANY = #{company}
